entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
